Detailed Description

OpenIPMP tool for protection of MPEG2 data.

Implements DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::IPMPTool.

virtual const Bit32T& DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::OpenIPMPTool::IPMPIdentifier (   )  const [virtual]
 

IPMP agent identifier.

Identifier 0 represents IPMP terminal, others represent IPMP descriptor identifiers of IPMP tools' logical instances.

Returns:
Identifier.
